GSD.description:
xen/console: harden hvc_xen against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.259 by commit 68b78f976ca47d52c03c41eded207a312e46b934. For more details please see the references link.
